name: Copycat (itch) (coder2k)
description:
This game has been created in 12 hours during the "Game dev challenge" which was organized by Twitch.tv/MostWanted38. The theme was Copycat.

This game is a 2.5D platformer in which you play as a dog. Another character - a cat - copies all your movements. You have to make both characters work together to be able to complete the three levels. The third level is randomly generated so that it is a new experience everytime.

You can play the game in the browser (see above) or download an executable for Windows by clicking the download button.

The making of this game was live-streamed on Twich in German on Twitch.tv/coder2k
